OUR GREEN BUSINESS STRATEGYOUR CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY POLICY
We lead in the management of our sustainability matters through our Corporate Responsibility (CR) Policy that identifies four strategic areas in 
which we aim to continue to drive our efforts in creating positive change, while minimizing negative impacts. 
• Governance: Maintain transparency in sustainability governance and communication with stakeholders
• Environment: Manage the impact of our operations on our environment
• Economic: Provide innovative interconnect solutions to enable a smart future
• Social: Provide opportunities and give back to our community
